text: Egh a memen oviba ofa gamir dakozimɨn, da tueghtɨ da bar isigh mɨghɨrightɨ, averenir kɨnim otogh. Ofa gamir gumazim arazir kamra damu, mati me God ko navir vamɨran ikiamin ofabar mɨn me meme mɨsogha an oviba isa ofa gami. Ezɨ kamaghɨra, ofa gamir gumazim, gumazir dapanir kamɨn arazir kuraba gɨn amangɨsɨ ofa damu, eghtɨ God an arazir kuraba gɨn amangam.”
